title: S&P's Glickman on Halliburton: US Focus Still Poses Risk(Audio)
itunes:title: S&P's Glickman on Halliburton: US Focus Still Poses Risk(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Stewart Glickman, Equity Analyst and Group Head of Energy and Materials from S&P Capital, on Halliburton and Baker Hughes quitting their $28 Billion merger.
